name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alaan - Capture Receipts and View Card Details

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to simplify the receipt upload process for Alaan users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Alaan experience with our Chrome Extension. Easily manage your expenses right from your browser—view card details and submit receipts with ease.

Add receipts by uploading, dragging and dropping, or capturing screenshots. Alaan’s automatic receipt matching technology ensures your records are always up-to-date and organized. Spend smarter, save time, and stay on top of your finances with Alaan.
